result.purpose: Defines various types and utilities for handling specific data representations and validations.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating type definitions and related functionalities in separate files for clarity and maintainability.

pkg/types/string-enums.go.purpose: Defines a StringEnum interface for types that represent string enumerations.

pkg/types/wrapped-address.go.purpose: Defines a wrapped address type for Ethereum and Solana with validation and serialization methods.

pkg/types/wrapped-big.go.purpose: Defines a BigInt type for handling large integers with various base conversions.

pkg/types/wrapped-string.go.purpose: Defines a NonEmptyStr type that ensures a string is non-empty and provides JSON marshaling/unmarshaling.
